MacroOp.Name: OMNI_CLOCK_GETRES_REALTIME
MacroOp.Brief: Changes the behavior of the clock_getres
MacroOp.Description:
Some systems (like QNX) only take @c CLOCK_REALTIME for clock_getres, but will return correct values for clock_gettime with @c CLOCK_MONOTONIC, defining this macro will change the behavior of what clock_getres calls.
Defining this macro will set it to @c CLOCK_REALTIME and with it undefined (default) the framework will use @c CLOCK_MONOTONIC
MacroOp.PlatformSpecific: This only affects non-Windows systems; defining this macro on Windows based platforms will have no effect on the framework code.
MacroOp.Synopsis: Some platforms do not have support for certain resolution timers when calling clock_getres this macro changes the underlying resolution used.
